projects.title: Teatwand Parallel
projects.bodyText:
- Automated teatspraying system designed for parallel sheds
 - Teatspraying arm mounted onto gantry 
 - Complex leg detection for detecting cow positions on platform   
 -  Smartly decides when to spray udders based on cups feedback

projects.title: Teatwand Stepover
projects.bodyText:
- Inline teatspraying system, which accurately sprays cows udders as they walk over.
 - Low-cost custom PCB control system.
 - Controlled using electronic keypad 
 - Utilizes reliable and robust tracking algorithms.  
 - Online monitoring support with Azure IoT

projects.title: Automated Chicken Trussing
projects.bodyText:
- Applying elastic trussing bands onto chickens
 - Cycle time of under 5 seconds per bird.
 - Realtime conveyor tracking 
 - KUKA Robot and Controller 
 - Integrated string tying machine
